data.title: Howard Z. - Physics Tutor in Sunnyvale, CA
data.meta_description: Howard is a tutor in Sunnyvale, CA (94087) : I help high school students improve their grades in physics classes (regular / honors / APs) and prepare for standardized tests (APs and SAT subject).
data.text:
Patient and knowledgeable

Explains the concepts very well.. like how he waits for the student to draw conclusions and then expand on it to deepen understanding. My son has had couple of lessons so far and we are very happy with his coaching.

Sunitha, 25 lessons with Howard

Inspiring

Our daughter does not feel connected to Physics in the classroom at school, but she does feel connected after each tutoring session with Howard. He provides the topic enrichment that she is not otherwise gaining at school.

Natalie, 11 lessons with Howard

Gold Standard

My son was impressed with not just the knowledge of Howard, but most importantly the fluency in AP Physics C. This subject without the level of fluency that Howard has, is very hard to cover and get the students trained well. Thank you, Howard!

Anonymous, 49 lessons with Howard

Great Help in Physics

Howard is a very knowledgeable Physics Tutor. He helped my daughter to solve complicated problems in AP Physics. As a direct result of this she is able to improve her grade in school.

Senthil, 7 lessons with Howard

Excellent AP Physics Tutor

Howard has done a great job explaining AP Physics, currently forces, to my student in a clear way that she understands much better than in class. He is an excellent communicator, very knowledgeable, and very personable. We are looking forward to more sessions with Howard to continue building upon the foundation we have.

John, 15 lessons with Howard

Great!

Howard knows the topics very well and is great is explaining the concepts . We've loved the way he teaches physics: clear and simple. My sons enjoy the physics class with Howard.

Sherri, 12 lessons with Howard

knowledgeble and very patient.

Howard covered the AP Physics tutoring for my son. We are very glad that he was able to connect with our son and go over each topic over a period of 25 sessions.

Dinesh, 28 lessons with Howard

Very good results

Howard tutored my daughter this recent Spring semester for AP Physics at Monta Vista Cupertino. The result was fantastic. She went from trending C to a high B after less than 10 sessions. I highly recommend Howard for his professionalism, experience, and teaching techniques.

Frederick, 10 lessons with Howard

Excellent!

Excellent experience and very helpful! We were so happy to find Howard and he was able to identify the studentâ€™s weakness and came up with effective lesson plan. Howard is patient, responsive, knowledgeable and pleasant!

Lili, 19 lessons with Howard

Best tutor!

My son is much more confident in physics and he's looking forward to learning more. He really appreciates Howard for his help. He is so passionate and I highly recommend him.

EJ, 13 lessons with Howard
